channel.title: FireBug [Firefox Addon]
channel.description:
This is an amazing add-on to Firefox. It let's you simulataneously check HTML, CSS etc.
[b]Inspect and edit HTML[/b] Firebug makes it simple to find HTML elements buried deep in the page. Once you've found what you're looking for, Firebug gives you a wealth of information, and lets you edit the HTML live. [b] Tweak CSS to perfection[/b] Firebug's CSS tabs tell you everything you need to know about the styles in your web pages, and if you don't like what it's telling you, you can make changes and see them take effect instantly. [b] Visualize CSS metrics [/b] When your CSS boxes aren't lining up correctly it can be difficult to understand why. Let Firebug be your eyes and it will measure and illustrate all the offsets, margins, borders, padding, and sizes for you. [b]Monitor network activity[/b] Your pages are taking a long time to load, but why? Did you go crazy and write too much JavaScript? Did you forget to compress your images? Are your ad partner's servers taking a siesta? Firebug breaks it all down for you file-by-file. LOADS MORE.
[center][url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1843][img]http://getfirebug.com/images/install1_4.png[/img][/url][/center]

item.title: FireBug [Firefox Addon]
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

BloodRayne:

Yeah, this was very common back when PayPal’s html buttons included prices in them, which could be edited with this.

haha that’s a cool idea, some sites still put the prices in the html too - but any decent web store would check the actual payment rather than just a successful one.

Read full topic

item.title: FireBug [Firefox Addon]
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

This is an amazing add-on to Firefox. It let’s you simulataneously check HTML, CSS etc.

[b]Inspect and edit HTML[/b]

Firebug makes it simple to find HTML elements buried deep in the page. Once you’ve found what you’re looking for, Firebug gives you a wealth of information, and lets you edit the HTML live.

Tweak CSS to perfection

Firebug’s CSS tabs tell you everything you need to know about the styles in your web pages, and if you don’t like what it’s telling you, you can make changes and see them take effect instantly.

Visualize CSS metrics

When your CSS boxes aren’t lining up correctly it can be difficult to understand why. Let Firebug be your eyes and it will measure and illustrate all the offsets, margins, borders, padding, and sizes for you.

Monitor network activity

Your pages are taking a long time to load, but why? Did you go crazy and write too much JavaScript? Did you forget to compress your images? Are your ad partner’s servers taking a siesta? Firebug breaks it all down for you file-by-file.

LOADS MORE.

[center][/center]

Read full topic
